alert.note: Alert for Central Middlesex County; Northwest Middlesex County; Western Essex (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 24 at 6:52PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Essex and north central Middlesex Counties through 715 PM EDT... At 652 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Tyngsborough, or near Chelmsford, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Strong winds could cause minor damage such as downed branches. Little to no impact from hail is expected. Locations impacted include... Lowell, Methuen, Chelmsford, Andover, Dracut, Tewksbury, Westford, Tyngsborough, Groton and Dunstable. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed.

area.areaDesc: Central Middlesex County; Northwest Middlesex County; Western Essex
